attributes.review: And it doesn’t let me open my phone for another hour because my screen goes completely dark

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and my phone started freaking out. I got so many viruses for downloading this app don’t do it. Also my camera won’t shut off I think the app is recording me. Be careful people.

attributes.review: As soon as i opened the app i noticed my pet yoogarus was flying awfully loud. this app steals your food, cooking utensils and any orange materials you have in your house. i do not recommend getting the app. it even stole my boyfriend that cheated on me 3 years ago.
attributes.title: this app is terrible !!!

attributes.review: I downloaded to see if trump was really that bad and he is and so is the app it’s horrible and not organized all it does is glitch don’t GET It my phone gets notifications all the time from it horrible

attributes.review: This app is slow and takes up more storage than it’s worth, it slowed my phone down so much that when my grandmother called me because she needed a ride to the hospital it kept cutting out and freezing, would not recommend.
attributes.userName: the username i wanted is taken
attributes.title: WARNING- THIS APP LED TO MY GRANDMOTHERS DEATH

attributes.review: This app has caused me so much frustration. It’s inability to update its system for its consumers needs makes me sick. It’s hard for me to believe that this is a good app when so many people hate it, no matter how good the app says it is.
attributes.title: Totally messed up

Not even my fat pig liked it and he eats everything smh 😡👁👄👁
attributes.title: Horrible FOOD

attributes.review: This app made my phone crash a couple times and it made my phone glitch and as soon as I deleted the app my phone was back to normal I think this app causes viruses to your phone.
attributes.title: This app is horrible

attributes.review: immediately after downloading the app, i stubbed my toe really bad. then, i got food poisoning from my trump supporting neighbor. after that, said neighbor proceeded to enter my home and steal my items. i am now broke and I have no possessions to my name.
attributes.title: this app ruined my life

attributes.review: ALL APPS MATTER! EXCEPT THIS ONE! This app has scarred my eyes. I cannot believe it is even on the appstore. Disgusting 🤮🤮🤮. This makes all the other apps in the store look bad. Imagine how the other apps feel sitting in the same store as this one😪 sending the other apps my prayers🙏
attributes.title: AN ABOMINATION TO APPS
